name: react-pdf-thumbnail-2
description: A fixed up React PDF Thumbnail Creator. Based of the https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-pdf-thumbnail which had a few issues for me

scripts.build: rm -rf /dist && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run copy-esm && npm run copy-cjs
scripts.build-patch: rm -rf /dist && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run copy-esm && npm run copy-cjs && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.build-minor: rm -rf /dist && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run copy-esm && npm run copy-cjs && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.build-major: rm -rf /dist && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run copy-esm && npm run copy-cjs && npm version major && npm publish

author: joshuajs
